content: hide tail if it curves that s if it curves that s okay okay handmade by nikelle staff cont hook -stuff as you go round 1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 round 2 2 single_crochet bobble 3 single_crochet 6 round 3-5 3 rnds 6 single_crochet 6 -fo leaving a tail to sew assembly i place the hook over the 3rd and 4th rnds from the top leaving the top 2 rnds showing make sure the bobble is pointed up and sew on hide tail handmade by nikelle you did it tag me in your posts @handmadebynikelle handmade by nikelle tester gallery @yarnaholicsewciopath @raeshandmade @jllocreates @infinitely knotted @cozycrochetcreations_ @theloopycraftalotl
